SELECT ? AS one FROM "tags" INNER JOIN "statuses_tags" ON "tags"."id" = "statuses_tags"."tag_id" WHERE "statuses_tags"."status_id" = $? AND "tags"."id" = $? LIMIT $?

SELECT "statuses".* FROM "statuses" INNER JOIN "statuses_tags" ON "statuses_tags"."status_id" = "statuses"."id" WHERE "statuses"."account_id" = $? AND "statuses"."deleted_at" IS ? AND "statuses_tags"."tag_id" = $? ORDER BY "statuses"."id" DESC
SELECT "tags".* FROM "tags" WHERE LOWER("tags"."name") = LOWER(?) ORDER BY "tags"."id" ASC LIMIT $?
